snippet: Many schools in the U.S. are off, so we’re taking a break ourselves — but should this holiday be known as “Columbus Day” or “indigenous Peoples Day”?...
lead_paragraph: Many schools in the U.S. are off, so we’re taking a break ourselves — but should this holiday be known as “Columbus Day” or “indigenous Peoples Day”?

headline.main: A Short Fall Break, but What Should We Call It?
